inputs.sentence: Jack and Ketty buy an apple in the market together.

outputs.sentence: Jack and Ketty sell an apple in the market together.

inputs.sentence: I wonder the reason why you want to laugh in this extraordinary situation?

outputs.sentence: I wonder the reason why you want to cry in this ordinary situation?

inputs.sentence: Steve is able to recommend movies that depicts the lives of beautiful minds.

outputs.sentence: Steve is unable to recommend movies that depicts the lives of ugly minds.

inputs.sentence: It is useful to have a team review before the final presentation.

outputs.sentence: It is useless to lack a team review before the final presentation.

inputs.sentence: Recently, we are more interested in leveraging AI to solve ethic issues.

outputs.sentence: Recently, we are less uninterested in leveraging AI to solve ethic issues.
